sources.title: 1997 - Crazy Six - He is the sixth one in his family. And he is a little bit crazy
sources.description:
When the Iron Curtain fell, the underworld rose!
Billie "Crazy Six" (Rob Lowe) and Dirty Mao (Mario Van Peebles) forge a shaky alliance to topple arms kingpin Raul (Ice-T). But when their scheme implodes, a three-way firefight erupts for control of the continent's chaos economy.

Original Title: Crazy Six (1997)

metadata.Plot: Billie is an American junkie who came to Eastern Europe to escape his problems and make some good money. They call him Crazy Six because he is the sixth child of his family and he is crazy for drugs. Raul is the Drug-Lord who deals plutonium on his spare time. Things get ugly when Crazy Six and an Arabic-French gangster steal the plutonium and a couple of bucks from the Drug-Lord. As Crazy Six tries to escape the dependence of drugs, Raul chases him and it's up to an American inspector helping the local police to straighten things up...
metadata.Actors: Rob Lowe, Mario Van Peebles, Ice-T, Burt Reynolds
